channel.title: Interoperability on Rukshan's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Interoperability on Rukshan's Blog

item.title: Why We Need Interoperability and HL7 FHIR
item.description: I was lucky enough to attend the DHIS2 annual conference at the University of Oslo last week, where I was able to meet experts from all around the world in digital health to discuss not just DHIS2 but also FHIR and interoperability in general.
